page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT TECHNOLOGY
page.content: Tractors built at the Coventry plant are the 200 series providing power out put from 30 to 88 h.p. There are seven models,2 or 4 wheel drive,with differ- ent specification of gearbox _ 8 to 12 speed synchromesh or M.F. multipower. Tractors can be fitted with or without a cab. On the 26/6/85 between 8.45 & 9.15a.m. 4 lorries loaded with tractors left M.F.for the docks of Felixstowe & Bristol. The final destination for the tractors being Israel & the U.S.A. {Rugby Autocar (Ford) }Birmingham Rd. The showroom has been there since 1934 They presently sell 70 cars a week, also selling commercial vehicles & spares.200 cars are serviced per week. The site employs 75 people. Top car Granda Scorpio Â£15 550, top speed 127 miles per hour.
